title: Representatives from Lazard, Clifford Chance arrive in Sri Lanka
body_lines: The representatives from the financial and legal advisory firms Lazard and Clifford Chance, hired by Sri Lanka for debts restructuring arrived on the island today, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe says.
Sri Lanka hired the heavyweight financial and legal advisers Lazard and Clifford Chance as it prepares for the difficult task of renegotiating its debts.
